dcterms:creator: Changmeng Zheng
Zhiwei Wu
Junhao Feng
Ze Fu
Yi Cai
dcterms:description: MNRE is a public human-annotated unbalanced multi-modal neural relation extraction dataset. It includes sentences with two name entities and an image ID to correlate the text with the image. The dataset was randomly re-split to ensure no overlap of classes between the training and testing sets.
dcterms:title: MNRE

dcterms:creator: Xu Han
Hao Zhu
Pengfei Yu
Ziyun Wang
Yuan Yao
Zhiyuan Liu
Maosong Sun
dcterms:description: FewRel is a public human-annotated balanced few-shot relation classification dataset consisting of 80 types of relations, each with 700 instances. The dataset is used for few-shot learning tasks and has been augmented with images for multi-modal experiments.
dcterms:title: FewRel

dcterms:description: FewRelsmall is a subset of FewRel that includes only clean images. It is used to explore relation extraction in few-shot learning settings.
dcterms:title: FewRelsmall
